ARABIC: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبْغُونَ عَنْهَا حِوَلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: remaining in them timelessly, for ever, with no desire to move away from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Where they will abide for ever, never wanting a change.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: there they will abide for ever, with no desire to be removed from there."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: without any desire to change their abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They will abide in it for ever, never wanting to shift from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Wherein they shall dwell (forever). No desire will they have for removal therefrom."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Abiding therein; they shall not desire removal from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: therein to dwell forever, desiring no removal out of them.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Wherein they will abide, with no desire to be removed from thence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They shall forever dwell in the Gardens of Paradise, desiring no change.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: As abiders therein, they shall not seek therefrom any change.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: to remain in them [forever]; they will not seek to leave it for another place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Wherein they shall dwell (for aye): no change will they wish for from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Wherein they shall dwell (forever). No desire will they have to be removed therefrom."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: where they will live for ever and never wish that they should be removed from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Abiding therein forever, without desiring any change therefrom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Wherein they abide eternally. They will not desire from it any transfer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:108] wherein they will abide, with no desire, demand, to be removed from them, to be transferred to some other [gardens].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Wherein they will abide, with no desire to be removed from thence) to another place.
